backend/main.mo: Motoko actor handling user profiles, restaurant info, menu, and gallery data with admin/user access control and migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module transforming old actor state to a new format while overriding the restaurant address.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence file linking a location-address update requirement to the specific frontend LocationSection component.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme configuration defining warm color variables for light and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting metadata, manifest, theme color, and loading the main React script.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, and launch configuration.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing install, activate, and fetch handlers for caching and offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering navigation, section switching, profile setup logic, and service worker registration.
Component enforcing authentication and admin permissions before rendering protected admin content.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPanel: Admin dashboard with tabbed interfaces for editing restaurant profile, menu, and gallery data.
frontend/src/components/admin/GalleryEdi: Admin UI for listing, adding, editing, and deleting gallery image metadata with dialog forms and preview cards.
frontend/src/components/admin/MenuEditor: Admin interface to manage menu categories and items, including creation, editing, and deletion via dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/Restaurant: Form for viewing and updating the restaurant’s profile fields such as name, description, owner, phone, and address.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button handling Internet Identity login/logout states with loading and error recovery logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new users to submit their name and save their profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Simple footer displaying copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Responsive top navigation bar with section switching, admin‑aware links, mobile menu, and login button.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays owner info and contact phone, falling back to a default number when profile data is missing.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Displays gallery images with a fallback set and opens a lightbox dialog for selected images.
frontend/src/components/sections/Locatio: Shows the restaurant's address, map link, and location details with fallback data.
frontend/src/components/sections/MenuSec: Loads menu categories and items with search filtering and seed fallbacks, grouping items by category.
frontend/src/components/sections/Overvie: Renders a hero section with restaurant profile info and feature cards plus an about section.
frontend/src/data/menuSeed.ts: Provides hardcoded seed categories and menu items used as fallback data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity login, storage, and context, exposing identity state and auth actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, admin status, restaurant profiles, and menu categories via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and theme variables for light and dark modes using a warm earthy color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers a service worker in production, handling successful registration, updates, and errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature lists, and pending requests related to updating displayed restaurant address information.
